Blueburn070973gbg8xan9tuz1c1xrp3gmkk10azz2vu1200622014-03-28T14:33:10ZGreater good3347453/* See also */[[Image:Blueburn.png|right|thumb|200px|A map showing the location of the Blueburn on the continent of Westeros.]]
The '''Blueburn''' is a river in [[the Reach]], the region of [[Westeros]] under the control of [[House Tyrell]] of [[Highgarden]]. It is a tributary of the [[Mander]]. It flows west from headlands near the border with [[the Stormlands]] into the Mander near [[Long Table]]. It runs past [[Grassy Vale]].<ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season1/#!/locations/highgarden/ HBO viewers guide, season 1 map, Highgarden entry]</ref>
